name: Landsknecht
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Mercenary with swagger

  • Expensive to have in the party

  • Benefits to others (morale, experience)

  • Martial instruments (drum and fife, etc.)

  • Out-of-combat advantages (impressive, negotiation, knows your price)

WEAPONS

  • Heavy weapons, heavy polearms, heavy firearms, heavy ranged

  • Light armor, no shields or helms

ENGAGEMENT

  • Varies with keeping? Cost in excess of usual?

  • One of each (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12), but choose as they like?

ABILITIES

  • Skirmisher (entering/exiting melee)

  • Bloodless (spend MP to halve damage)

  • Aura Of Experience (allies)

  • Bonuses from fashion

MOVES FROM 0.1:

  • MERCHANT OF FIGHTING (trait): Your max MP for Landsknecht is 3. You are trained in wielding Martial and Heavy weapons. Whenever you use the Intuizione move to attempt to discern a person’s price to be influenced, you roll with advantage.

  • BLADE WHISPERER (trait): You may spend a day forging a telepathic link with the soul of a Martial or Heavy weapon. If you do so, it grants +1 to rolls to attack with it, and you may use it for the DANCING BLADE Move, if you have access to it. 

  • SKIRMISHER: When you charge into battle or seek rapid egress, roll+CHA:

  • On a 10+, you dodge all foes in your path. On a 7-9, you weave through your foes, but each foe you pass deals half damage to you.

  • BLOODLESS (trait): Any time you would take damage from a physical wound or blow, you may spend 1 MP to instead take half that damage.

  • AURA OF EXPERIENCE (trait): Allies within 10 ft of you get +1 to rolls for melee attacks.

  • DANCING BLADE: When you command your linked blade to battle a foe on your behalf, spend 1 MP and roll+CHA: On a 10+, your blade hovers in the air and may use the Pugni move independently from you for up to 10 minutes. On a 7-9, same as 10+, but you must use a Move to control the blade with magic.

  • Isn’t there a thing about IRL landsknecht getting fancy fabrics from the places they fought in? Maybe something to do with fashion and Awe rolls, acquiring new fashions in unfamiliar places, etc.
